mapper.sql: equipment_asset_id, equipment_code, equipment_name, position_code, position_name, wind_id, department, hierarchy, crew, company_code, cost_center, maintenance_team, address, manufacturer, equipment_number, fixed_assets, date_manufacture, install_date, date_delivery, equipment_information, supplier, asset_status, asset_status_date, asset_code, asset_value, monthly_depreciation_rate, component_id, output_id, run_id, equipment_id,position_id,wind_name,crew_name,type_name,supplier_name,asset_status_name,equipment_type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from equipment_asset_ledger
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from ( select e.*,sc.title as asset_status_name,f.wind_name as wind_name, c.crew_name as crew_name,i.equipment_type as equipment_type, p.position_name as position_name,s.supplier_name as supplier_name, p.position_code as position_code,i.type_name as type_name
distinct
from equipment_asset_ledger e left join crew_information c on c.crew_id=e.crew left join equipment_classification i on i.equipment_id=e.equipment_id left join position_encode p on p.position_id=e.position_id left join wind_field f on f.wind_id=e.wind_id left join supplier s on s.supplier_id=e.supplier left join sp_code sc ON e.asset_status = sc.name left join sp_code_type d ON sc.code_type_id = d.id where d.name='ASSET_STATUS') e
order by ${orderByClause}

select e.*,sc.title as asset_status_name,f.wind_name as wind_name, c.crew_name as crew_name,i.equipment_type as equipment_type, p.position_name as position_name,s.supplier_name as supplier_name, p.position_code as position_code,i.type_name as type_name from equipment_asset_ledger e left join crew_information c on c.crew_id=e.crew left join equipment_classification i on i.equipment_id=e.equipment_id left join position_encode p on p.position_id=e.position_id left join wind_field f on f.wind_id=e.wind_id left join supplier s on s.supplier_id=e.supplier left join sp_code sc ON e.asset_status = sc.name left join sp_code_type d ON sc.code_type_id = d.id where d.name='ASSET_STATUS' and e.asset_status != '01' and equipment_asset_id = #{equipmentAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select e.*,sc.title as asset_status_name,f.wind_name as wind_name, c.crew_name as crew_name,i.equipment_type as equipment_type, p.position_name as position_name,s.supplier_name as supplier_name, p.position_code as position_code,i.type_name as type_name from equipment_asset_ledger e left join crew_information c on c.crew_id=e.crew left join equipment_classification i on i.equipment_id=e.equipment_id left join position_encode p on p.position_id=e.position_id left join wind_field f on f.wind_id=e.wind_id left join supplier s on s.supplier_id=e.supplier left join sp_code sc ON e.asset_status = sc.name left join sp_code_type d ON sc.code_type_id = d.id where d.name='ASSET_STATUS' and e.asset_status != '01' and equipment_asset_id = #{equipmentAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into equipment_asset_ledger (equipment_asset_id, equipment_code, equipment_name, position_code, position_name, wind_id, department, hierarchy, crew, company_code, cost_center, maintenance_team, address, manufacturer, equipment_number, fixed_assets, date_manufacture, install_date, date_delivery, equipment_information, supplier, asset_status, asset_status_date, asset_code, asset_value, monthly_depreciation_rate, component_id, output_id, run_id, equipment_id, enclosure) values (#{equipmentAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintenanceTeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedAssets,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateManufacture,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{installDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateDelivery,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{equipmentInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetStatusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthlyDepreciationRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{componentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enclosure,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

mapper.select: select distinct count(*) from equipment_asset_ledger e left join crew_information c on c.crew_id=e.crew left join equipment_classification i on i.equipment_id=e.equipment_id left join position_encode p on p.position_id=e.position_id left join wind_field f on f.wind_id=e.wind_id left join supplier s on s.supplier_id=e.supplier

select distinct count(*) from (select e.* from equipment_asset_ledger e left join crew_information c on c.crew_id=e.crew left join equipment_classification i on i.equipment_id=e.equipment_id left join position_encode p on p.position_id=e.position_id left join wind_field f on f.wind_id=e.wind_id left join supplier s on s.supplier_id=e.supplier where e.asset_status != '01' ) e
